column4: I dont believe this is ubuntu related, but for some reason when I hold the power button on my laptop it reboots instead of turns off.. When I shutdown with ubuntu it reboots.  I upgraded my ram on this laptop and I'm thinking it has something to do with that
However I've tried removing the memory and such and it still happens
Nah I've looked, there's no power management stuff in the bios
- there should be something about power in there, even if it talks about power saving (its usually at the bottom of that). what bios do you use?
